abstract: The signature for blocks called by SceneKit to modify particle properties on each frame of simulation, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/addModifier(forProperties:at:modifier:)] method.

declaration.code: typealias SCNParticleModifierBlock = (UnsafeMutablePointer<UnsafeMutableRawPointer>, UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>, Int, Int, Float) -> Void

overview:
## Discussion

The block takes the following parameters:

Use this block to change properties of individual particles on each frame of simulation.

The following example illustrates setting up a modifier block that alters particle’s position and velocity:

items.description: A dictionary that optionally associates particle properties with objects that animate a property’s value for each particle.
items.name: propertyControllers

items.description: Adds a block that modifies particle properties, to be executed each time SceneKit renders a frame.
items.name: addModifier(forProperties:at:modifier:)

items.description: Removes particle modifier blocks for the specified stage of the particle simulation.
items.name: removeModifiers(at:)

items.description: Removes all particle modifier blocks associated with the particle system.
items.name: removeAllModifiers()

items.description: Keys identifying properties of individual particles, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/propertyControllers] dictionary and the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/handle(_:forProperties:handler:)] and [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/addModifier(forProperties:at:modifier:)] methods.
items.name: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty

items.description: Stages of SceneKit’s particle simulation process into which you can insert modifier blocks, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/addModifier(forProperties:at:modifier:)] method.
items.name: SCNParticleModifierStage
